from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { translations } from './translations'; const DestinationsPage = ({ lang, setLang }) => { const [activeLocation, setActiveLocation] = useState('all'); const [activeType, setActiveType] = useState('all'); const [isLangOpen, setIsLangOpen] = useState(false); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(""); const t = (key) => (translations[lang] ? translations[lang][key] : null) || translations['en'][key] || key; const languages = [ { code: 'en', label: 'English' }, { code: 'si', label: 'Sinhala' }, { code: 'ta', label: filteredDestinations = destinations.filter(dest => (activeLocation === 'all' || dest.locationKey === activeLocation) && (activeType === 'all' || dest.typeKey === activeType) && (t(dest.nameKey).toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || t(dest.descKey).toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase())) ); return (
{/* --- Navbar --- */}
EXPLORESOUTH
{t('home')} {t('about')} {t('destinations')} {t('hotels')} {t('restaurants')} {t('transport')} {t('contact')}

{/* --- Sticky Filter & Search Bar --- */}
{/* Search Input */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} placeholder={t('searchHint')} className="w-full pl-14 pr-6 py-4 bg-slate-50 border-2 border-transparent rounded-2xl focus:bg-white focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-blue-500/10 transition-all outline-none text-slate-800 text-lg shadow-inner" />
{/* Location Picker */}
{locations.map(loc => ( ))}

{t('showing')} {filteredDestinations.length} {t('amazingPlaces')}

{filteredDestinations.map(dest => (

)}

{dest.rating}

{t('explore')}
))}

); }; export default DestinationsPage;
